flashlight.name: flashlight
flashlight.desc: A working flashlight in this endless darkness. Now I'll be able to see something.
flashlight.use_msg: You light up your newly found flashlight. This will help you see in here...
flashlight.error_msg: I should preserve battery for a darker room.

You place the c4 on the door. And now everything is in my hands. 
I should take the remote from my inventory and blow it.

remote.error_msg:
... ... ... ... does it work?? ... BOOOOOOOM!!! 
You blowed yourself up......
